title: Bachelor star Nichole Wood teases new romance with hunky construction worker
text:
She failed to find love with Matt Agnew during the last season of The Bachelor.

But Nichole Wood now has a new man in her life - in the form of hunky construction worker, Jake Yard.

The 25-year-old shared an intimate snap alongside her rumoured boyfriend this week, with the genetically blessed pair doing face masks together in bed.

She's found love! Nichole Wood (left) shared a sweet couple's snap with her rumoured new boyfriend, construction worker Jake Yard

Nichole was adorned in sexy black lingerie in the sultry snap, placing her hand around Jake's shoulder - who went completely shirtless for the occasion.

'Having a self care night with this one @jakeeyard,' Nichole captioned the shot, followed by two love-heart emojis.

Jake, who owns his own company Jake Yard Constructions, later posted the same snap to his own feed - seemingly confirming the pair are an item.

Making her happy! Jake (right), who owns his own company Jake Yard Constructions, shared the same romantic snap to her own page. Pictured with a friend in July

A friend of Nichole's confirmed to Daily Mail Australia that the couple are very much together.

'Nichole was looking for something more organic and real, and she's found that with Jake,' says the pal.

'She doesn't care about the reality TV world and Instagram fame. She just wanted to find somebody normal and genuine.'

'Nichole was looking for something more organic and real, and she's found that with Jake,' a friend told Daily Mail Australia on Friday

Her new romance may come as a surprise to fans, as just weeks ago she was dating Married At First Sight hunk Billy Vincent.

The pair were first linked together back in August, after being pictured sharing a very steamy smooch on the street - while The Bachelor was still on air.

But just one month later, Nichole admitted that the duo had called it quits during a live Q and A with fans.

'We still talk': The Bachelor's Nichole confirmed her split from Married At First Sight's Billy Vincent (pictured) weeks ago

'Billy and I are still friends,' she explained.

'We just decided that it's better as friends right now, for what we both want in life... but we still talk most days.'

She later added: 'We just decided that it's not really a romantic thing, it's more of a friendship thing.'
description: She failed to find love with Matt Agnew during the last season of The Bachelor.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
